title: Three Client Issues
body:
Hello,
There are a few problems consistently coming up in my client:

1: League will flash the logo on startup, then quit.  I usually have to try a couple times before it actually opens.
2: When logging in, I will sometimes receive a message that I could not connect to the authentication service, and I will have to restart the client to login.
3: After a match, my "play" button will go grey, claiming the game is patching.  If I wait, the grey-ness persists, and if I restart the client, the button will work again.

Are these issues related and/or fixable? 

Thanks!

replies.body:
I'm here to lend a hand! 

1. This can happen if your security settings are blocking the patcher from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix that.  A computer restart might help as well!
2. This can happen if your connection is either unstable or also causing a block from accessing the authentication server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can resolve that.
3. Same as number 2, some connection blocks seem to be getting in the way.  

Let me know if you have any questions!
